quoteLast: With enormous losses the brigades of Lennox and Malmberg have stormed the positions occupied by the artillery on the enemy's left wing, and have captured numerous guns. The thunder of cannon coming from the valley can be distinctly heard here on the heights. Fisher's division has signaled that they have successfully driven back the enemy.
title: Banzai! by Parabellum
author: Grautoff, Ferdinand Heinrich, 1871-1935

quoteFirst: "How do you know he never? Is
quoteLast: a fair average? Is it? Is it?"
title: Judith Lynn: A Story of the Sea
author: Donnell, Annie Hamilton, 1862-1943

quoteFirst: "They have settled on the huts as the best of all for this work--a nurse to a hut and from
quoteLast: dozen patients for her to attend. Work? I believe you!"
title: Belinda of the Red Cross
author: Hamilton, Robert W.; Scott, A. O. (Arthur Orange), 1882?-1946 [Illustrator]

quoteFirst: Now, no man ever could suppose that twenty-four _real_ hours could be included in the space of three: but where is the absurdity of affirming, that the feigned business of twenty-four _imagined_ hours, may not more naturally be represented in the compass of three _real_ hours, than the like feigned business of twenty-four years in the same proportion of real time? For the _proportions_ are always real; and much nearer, by his permission! of
title: An English Garner: Critical Essays & Literary Fragments
author: Arber, Edward, 1836-1912 [Editor]; Collins, John Churton, 1848-1908 [Author of introduction, etc.]; Seccombe, Thomas, 1866-1923 [Editor]
